definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be dislocated, alienated (Ar. waqa9a is fall, fall down, fall upon, befal, happen)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[תֵּקַע]] Je 6:8; [[וַתֵּ֫קַע]] Ge 32:26 + 2 t.; dislocated Ge 32:26 (Jacob's thigh); elsewhere fig. of [[נפשׁ]]; torn away, alienated from any one, sq. [[מִן]] Je 6:8, Ez Eze 23:17; sq. [[מֵעַל]] v:Eze 23:18.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְהוֹקַעֲנוּם]] consec. 2Sa 21:6; Impf. [[וַיּׁקִיעֻם]] v:2Sa 21:9; Imv. [[הוֹקַע]] Nu 25:4; of some solemn form of execution, but mng. uncertain: Aq Ges impale; LXX SyrVer expose (e)chlia/zein, paradeigmati)zein); Targum Vulgate crucify; Rs:Rel. Sem. 398 (419) throw down (Ar. 0wqa9a) a rock (cf. 2Ch 25:12): + [[ליהזה]] 2Sa 21:6 (´[[לפני י]] v:2Sa 21:9), Nu 25:4.
